Properties summary

ActivityId
ActivityId

Gets or sets activityId of job.
BackupManagementType
BackupManagementType

Gets or sets backup management type to execute the current job. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'AzureIaasVM', 'MAB', 'DPM', 'AzureBackupServer', 'AzureSql'
EndTime
EndTime

Gets or sets the end time.
EntityFriendlyName
EntityFriendlyName

Gets or sets friendly name of the entity on which the current job is executing.
Operation
Operation

Gets or sets the operation name.
StartTime
StartTime

Gets or sets the start time.
Status
Status

Gets or sets job status.
